PrepareSelfie.Title: Get ready for your selfie
PrepareSelfie.SubTitle: Please put your phone in front of your face

ChooseCountry.Title: Scan your ID
ChooseCountry.SubTitle: Please select the ID issuing country from the dropdown list

GlobalDocument.Title: Get ready to scan your ID
GlobalDocument.SubTitle: Prepare the front of your document

CameraDocument.Title: Scan your ID
CameraDocument.SubTitle: Make sure your ID document clearly shows your face.

Congratulations.Title:
Congratulations
you’re done!
Congratulations.SubTitle: Your identity verification has been completed.

Error.Title: There's a problem
Error.SubTitle:
We're really sorry.
We’re working to fix it as soon as possible. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

FailedAttempts.Title:
Your identity verification
has been submitted
FailedAttempts.SubTitle: We'll get back to you. Thank you!

Selfie.TabTitle: Tab to see tips for taking your selfie
Selfie.Title: Tips for taking your selfie
Items: Use a neutral expression, no smiling and have your eyes open.
Position your face inside the circle on screen until two green circles appears.
Move your head slightly when instructed.

Document.TabTitle: Tab to view tips for scanning your ID
Document.Title: Tips for scanning your ID
Items: Place the document on a dark, flat surface in excellent lighting.

UploadDocument.TabTitle: Tab to view tips to upload your ID
UploadDocument.Title: Tips to upload your ID
Items: Image must be at least 600 x 600 pixels but not more than 1200 x 1200 pixels.
Image must be in JPEG or PNG file format.
Image must be at least 56 kilobytes but not more than 10 megabytes.

ScanRfid.TabTitle: Tab for tips on how to scan your eID
ScanRfid.Title: Tips on how to scan your eID
Items: Prepare to hold your phone near your ID to scan the electronic chip from your document.
Some ePassports, such as the US ePassport, have an RFID chip embedded in the back cover of the travel document.

TimeOut.Title: Are you still there?
TimeOut.SubTitle: If not, we'll close this session in:

Expired.Title: You session has expired
Expired.SubTitle: You have been logged out due to inactivity.

IdExpired.Title: ID expired
IdExpired.SubTitle:
Your identity document has expired however, if you consider this is an error or if you consider this is an error or if you have another identity document, please try again.

Would you like to try again?

SkipRfid.Title: Having trouble reading your electronic ID?

InformationNoMatch.Title: Sorry to hear that
InformationNoMatch.SubTitle: Would you like to try again?

CancelVerification.Title: Cancel verification
CancelVerification.SubTitle:
Verifications made will be lost

Are you sure to continue?

ExceededAttempts.Title: Max attempt limit
ExceededAttempts.SubTitle: You’ve exceeded the maximum attempt limit. We were unable to complete the verification process.

LocationDenied.Title: You have denied access to your location
LocationDenied.SubTitle: In order to continue, please enable access to your location in your phone settings.

CameraDenied.Title: You have denied access to your camera
CameraDenied.SubTitle: In order to continue, please enable access to your camera in your phone settings.

OTPError.Title: Oops !
OTPError.SubTitle: The verification code you entered is incorrect.
